google_bigtable_table.description: Creates a Google Cloud Bigtable table inside an instance.

instance_name.description: The name of the Bigtable instance.

split_keys.description: A list of predefined keys to split the table on.

column_family.description: A group of columns within a table which share a common configuration. This can be specified multiple times. Structure is documented below.

project.description: The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it

family.description: The name of the column family.
